page.title: 15Scrap yard
page.content: Avon Forest Ltd is a scrap yard which deals mostly with cars,and is a member of the Vehicle Dismantle Club.It has been at 120 Boundary Lane for 27 years.Before the scrap yard was there,the ground was common land.The scrap yard covers 2 acres of ground.Five people work at Avon Forest Ltd which is open every day of the week.The average number of cars that the scrap yard is 250 at any time but the number has been as high as 400.The scrap yard has two recovery vehicles.35 to 40 cars are bought to the yard a week.At week-ends the scrap yard has had up to 500 customers who buy mostly small accessories such as door handles.
